      • sync1

        public void sync1()
        Test sync. IRQ is already asserted before sync is entered, but inhibit IRQ is on.

      • sync2

        public void sync2()
        Test sync. IRQ will be asserted a few milliseconds afterwards in a separate thread.

      • sync3

        public void sync3()
        Test sync without inhibit IRQ. IRQ will be asserted a few milliseconds afterwards in a separate thread.
